CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 30, 1955, pg. 11 reads: "Beauticians Make Ready...for the gala May 1 and 2 trade show which takes over the Fort Pitt Hotel for the two days. Pictured are various chairmen and members of the Beauty Shop Owners.  Seated are Ocea Adams, Elma Wall, Thelma Dickerson, president; Lena Thomas and Ida Neal, general chairman of the trade show.  Standing are Mayotis Johnson, Louise Martin and Lucia Lee. - Harris PHoto."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of various chairmen and members of the Beauty Shop Owners, from left, seated: Ocea Adams, Elma Wall, Thelma Dickerson, Lena Thomas, and Ida Neal; standing: Mayotis Johnson, Louise Martin, and Lucia Lee, posed behind table in interior with seal on wall inscribed "Frontiers, Advancement through Service...YMCA"
